## ðŸ”¨ Installing Dependencies The exact steps depend on your Nextcloud platform. If you use Docker for your Nextcloud instance, you can install Exiftool by using a custom docker image. - **Ubuntu/Debian**: `sudo apt install libimage-exiftool-perl` - **Fedora**: `sudo dnf install perl-Image-ExifTool` - **Arch Linux**: `sudo pacman -S perl-image-exiftool` - **Alpine**: `apk add --no-cache exiftool` - **MacOS**: `brew install exiftool` - **FreeBSD**: `sudo pkg install p5-Image-ExifTool`
